events.1826: The first Hindi newspaper 'Udant Martand'  was published from Calcutta under the Editorship of Pandit Shridhar Shukla.
events.1867: Maulana Mohammad Kasim Nanantavi established the famous Islamic educational centre 'Dar- Ul -Ulum' in Devkampa, Uttar Pradesh.
events.1887: The 7th Battalion of the Mechanised Infantry Regiment was raised as 37 DOGRAS by Lt. Col V. Rivas at Sialkot.
events.1895: Pandurang Sakharam Pisurlekar, great historian in Goa, was born.
events.1915: Krishen Behari Lall, Indian Civil Service and Diplomat, was born at Delhi.
events.1919: Rabindranath Tagore returned back the honour as a protest against the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.
events.1950: Devdutta Ramkrishna Bhandarkar, great historian and archaeologist, passed away.
events.1952: S.C.Mathur was appointed as the Narcotics Commissioner of India. He headed this office till 01-07-1955.
events.1955: Narayan Malhar Joshi, father of Indian Worker's Movement, passed away.
events.1962: 69 killed in a bus crash near Ahmedabad.
events.1977: Express Train fell into Beki river in Assam killing 44 persons.
events.1987: Goa becomes the 25th state of India.
events.1995: Notification issued for the constitution of Jharkhand Autonomous District Council.
events.1999: India rejects U.N. offer to send a special envoy to defuse Indo-Pak tensions.
